project.title: [Client Redacted] - SMMS Replacement Project

challenge.summary: Modernize critical Search and Rescue operations systems with zero downtime migration to cloud infrastructure while integrating live data interfaces for GIS applications and maintaining strict [Client Redacted] security requirements.

deliverables: Application design for AWS Cloud-native services
Containerization and migration to serverless core infrastructure
Docker/ECS container architecture and PostgreSQL integration
Auto-scaling for containers and EC2 instances
Security implementation meeting ITSG and [Client Redacted] compliance
Staged implementation testing with inline remediation
Infrastructure as Code deployment via Service Catalog

outcomes: ✅ Zero downtime migration of critical SAR system to AWS cloud
✅ Containerized architecture with Docker/ECS ensuring 24/7 availability
✅ Enhanced operational efficiency for Search and Rescue operations
✅ Integrated GIS and real-time data capabilities
✅ Scalable IT infrastructure adaptable to future needs
